Package com.strongjoshua.console

Class CommandExecutor

java.lang.Object
com.strongjoshua.console.CommandExecutor
public class CommandExecutor extends Object
Extend this class and fill it with methods (also public) that you wish to have work with the Console. Then call Console.setCommandExecutor(CommandExecutor).

Notes
  • Arguments must be primitive types (the only exception being String).
  • No two methods, of the same name, can have the same number of parameters. Make multiple methods with more specific names if they must have the same number of parameters.
  • Methods are case-insensitive when invoked from the console.
